application

Class SchedulerSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.SchedulerSimulator

  • public class SchedulerSimulator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for creating all objects necessary for a simulation, with the correct parameters, and creating the relationships between them.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SchedulerSimulator(int maxShortTermSchedulerLoad, int quantumSizeMs, SchedulingStrategy schedulingStrategy)
      This method is responsible for creating an instance of the simulator, given quantum size, max load and strategy.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SchedulerSimulator

        public SchedulerSimulator(int maxShortTermSchedulerLoad,
                          int quantumSizeMs,
                          SchedulingStrategy schedulingStrategy)
        This method is responsible for creating an instance of the simulator, given quantum size, max load and strategy.
        Parameters:
        maxShortTermSchedulerLoad - - max load of `ShortTermScheduler`
        quantumSizeMs - - quantum size in milliseconds
        schedulingStrategy - - scheduling strategy to use in this simulation
